body.name: Dickies Men's No-Scratch Leather Mechanic Belt
features: Fabric type 25% Polyurethane, 30% Bonded Leather, 45% Split Leather

UNIQUE: At first you may think "how does this belt work?" Well, bear with us for a minute. This no-metal visible belt is a must-have if you are looking to hold your pants subtly. Its unique design makes the extra length of the belt sits on the inside.

GREAT FEATURE: A metal plate is sewn into the belt strap which includes a metal pin that sticks out toward you, closing your belt within discretion. This belt does NOT set off metal detectors, keep your belt on when passing metal detectors at the airport.

DICKIES QUALITY: When you see a Dickies product you know that it is going to last. We make our belt for hard workers, dedicated men who need a belt that they can rely on, all day long. This no-buckle belt is no exception and is your new go-to belt.

SIZING: For best fit, select a belt size 2 inches larger than your pant size. For example, if your pant size is 34, shop belt size Medium (36-38). Strap is 1.4 inches wide for a standard fit that will fit all of the belt loops in your closet.
body.description: This No-Scratch Mechanic Belt from Dickies is sure to be your new everyday go-to. The sleek and timeless style is durable and meant to last. Featuring an english style tip shape, mechanic style buckle and embossed Dickies logo, this belt from Dickies will be your new favorite. Pair with Khakis, jeans or other pants to create an effortlessly cool and functional look. Since its beginnings in 1922, every piece of Dickies workwear has stood for the quality, toughness, and pride that embodies the spirit of the American worker.

Since its beginnings in 1922, every piece of Dickies workwear has stood for the quality, toughness, and pride that embodies the spirit of the American worker.

reviews.reviewerName: Great for work. I'm on my feet all shift and they helped with my foot pain
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality and Price
reviews.reviewText: I order the belt for work and it fit perfectly. I love the no show belt buckle it's nice not getting scratched or poked. Will definitely be ordering it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite no scratch belt by far
reviews.reviewText: I love this belt. I used to wear one of these. It was the first brand I tried so I didn't think much about trying a cheaper option once it was pretty stretched after years of use. Price was the sole factor for me chosing something else. This belt is great quality and a good buy at this price. The $5 I saved was not worth it. The other belts held up well but were not as well constructed l. And that choice to go with the cheap belts was a painful choice my wife and I. This belt uses a single prong with a ball on the end. The other belts I've tried had double prong with no ball on the end. First off the single prong belt is easier to use. Secondly let me tell you if you're going to accidentally step on one of these belts in the middle of the night you want it to be this one. The other belts never went into my foot if I stepped on the prongs but I had some amazing blood blisters. And the prongs on the cheap belt would bend if stepped on, especially if you step on the leather side of the buckle. Once they get bent they weaken and bend from normal use. They eventually broke off and now I'm very thankfully back in a Dickies.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value and well made
reviews.reviewText: These are great belts, I work in the automotive field and never need to worry about scratching a surface with my belt. I have had several of these and they wear well and last for years.Will continue to purchase these and keep a few on hand. I highly recommend this belt.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good but one issue
reviews.reviewText: It’s a black mechanic belt so it matches my uniform, and it won’t scratch anything I lean/rub against. It fits me well and it looks nice. I do occasionally have to re-clip it, because sometimes it will pop open if I lift tires or am working in an awkward position. That’s more of a no problem but it is a little less secure than your average metal buckle belt. 4.5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I will only buy this belt from now on.
reviews.reviewText: As a big boy, most other belts tend to dig into my muffin top. Which is why I decided to try this one out. It works like a charm!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Looks good very comfortable and holds up well in work environment super satisfied

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good belt but..
reviews.reviewText: It is a nice quality belt. I would have given more stars, but after a lot of use, the holes stretch out, and the belt will come undone. Otherwise it's great. Not too soft, not too stiff.
Love this belt as it seems my ass has disappeared no more pulling my pants up.

reviews.reviewTitle: Buy one size larger than you think
reviews.reviewText: I originally purchased my first belt to match the size of my pants. Once it arrived, i could get the belt on, but it was on the very last notch. I returned and bought one size up. Now the belt is sitting comfortably in the middle of the hole choices. I love the idea of not having a buckle that will scratch things if i brush against them. Very handy for the automotive industry. I will see how this belt holds up.

reviews.reviewTitle: BONITO UTIL CONTRA PARA GENTE CON ALERGIA
reviews.reviewText: LLEGO A TIEMPO, BUSCABA UN CINTURÓN QUE NO TUVIERA HEBILLA METÁLICA, YA QUE ERA UN REGALO PARA MI HERMANO QUE ES ALÉRGICO A LOS METALES, LO ÚNICO METÁLICO QUE TIENE ES LA PUNTA REDONDA QUE ENTRA EN LOS ORIFICIOS.MI HERMANO QUEDO FASCINADO CON EL CINTURÓN ADEMAS QUE ME COMENTO QUE LA HEBILLA ERA MUY CÓMODA, PERCEPTIBLE, ADEMAS LA TALLA ES LA CORRECTA COMO INDICA LA TABLA DE LA PUBLICACIÓN.NO PUDE SACARLE FOTOS POR SER UN REGALO, LO ÚNICO ES QUE SOLO VIENE EN UNA BOLSA DE PLÁSTICO SIN CAJA NI NADA, Y EL PRECIO SIN OFERTA NO ES MUY BARATO, AUNQUE SI ES PIEL O ESO CREO, PERO COMO CUMPLIÓ MUY BIEN SU OBJETIVO DE NO CAUSAR ALERGIA AL METAL LE PONGO CINCO ESTRELLAS.

The belt is made of a good quality leather and is sized appropriately. I was a little disappointed in the width of the belt, but thats entirely my fault as I did not read the description well enough. Its NOT too thin, just not as wide as I expected. all-in-all a good buy.
